languages.text: "Впрочем, вы вольны называть наши отношения так, как вам больше нравится, шерин. Все же слова — это просто слова. Однако как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позаботиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, вы вольны называть наши отношения так, как вам больше нравится, шерин. Все же слова — это просто слова. Однако как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позабоиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

languages.text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, вы вольны называть наши отношения так, как вам больше нравится, шерин. Все же слова — это просто слова. Однако как вы позаботились обо мне, так и я хочу позаботиться о вас... Чуть сверх оговоренного. Вот, держите: скромный дар в благодарность за помощь. И пусть Великий и дальше оберегает пути, по которым вы ходите".

traits.locale_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would lie to take care of you... And go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. There you go, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

"You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words are wind and mean little. But you took good care of me, and so I would lie to take care of you... And go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. There you go, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

"You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

"You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

"You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

languages.text: “我们之间的关系，随便你怎么称呼都好，亲爱的，毕竟话语没有太大意义。但你对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: “我们之间的关系，随便你怎么称呼都好，亲爱的，毕竟话语没有太大意义。但你对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”
“我们之间的关系，随便你怎么称呼都好，亲爱的，毕竟话语没有太大意义。但你对我照顾有加，所以我也希望能照顾到你……并稍微超出我们协议中的严格条款。收下吧，这是我带来的小礼物，带着我的感激之情。愿至高无上的神皇始终指引你的道路。”

languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

languages.text: «Puede llamar como quiera a nuestra relación, shereen. Después de todo, las palabras se las lleva el viento. Pero ha cuidado bien de mí, y a mí también me gustaría cuidar bien de usted a cambio... e ir un poco más allá de los términos estrictos de nuestro acuerdo. Tome: un pequeño regalo como muestra de gratitud. Y que el Exaltado vigile los caminos que recorra».
languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: «Puede llamar como quiera a nuestra relación, shereen. Después de todo, las palabras se las lleva el viento. Pero ha cuidado bien de mí, y a mí también me gustaría cuidar bien de usted a cambio... e ir un poco más allá de los términos estrictos de nuestro acuerdo. Tome: un pequeño regalo como muestra de gratitud. Y que el Exaltado vigile los caminos que recorra».

languages.text: 「あたしたちの関係をどう呼ぼうと自由よ、シャリーン。結局のところ、言葉はほとんど意味がないものなのだから。でも、あんたはあたしを気にかけてくれた。だから、あたしもあんたを気にかけたいの。ここに感謝のしるしとしてささやかな贈り物を持ってきたわ。それから、エグザルテッド・ワンが、あんたの進む道を見守ってくださいますように」
languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしたちの関係をどう呼ぼうと自由よ、シャリーン。結局のところ、言葉はほとんど意味がないものなのだから。でも、あんたはあたしを気にかけてくれた。だから、あたしもあんたを気にかけたいの。ここに感謝のしるしとしてささやかな贈り物を持ってきたわ。それから、エグザルテッド・ワンが、あんたの進む道を見守ってくださいますように」

languages.text: "Ihr dürft unsere Beziehung nennen, wie Ihr möchtet, Shereen. Worte bedeuten schließlich wenig. Doch Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, also will ich mich gut um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."
languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr dürft unsere Beziehung nennen, wie Ihr möchtet, Shereen. Worte bedeuten schließlich wenig. Doch Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, also will ich mich gut um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."

"Ihr dürft unsere Beziehung nennen, wie Ihr möchtet, Shereen. Worte bedeuten schließlich wenig. Doch Ihr habt Euch gut um mich gekümmert, daher möchte ich mich um Euch kümmern ... und leicht über die strikten Bedingungen unserer Vereinbarung hinausgehen. Hier, ich habe Euch ein kleines Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit mitgebracht. Und möge der Erhabene über die Pfade wachen, die Ihr beschreitet."

languages.text: « Vous pouvez qualifier notre relation de ce que vous voulez, shereen. Les mots n'ont que peu de sens, après tout. Cependant, comme vous avez pris soin de moi, j'aimerais vous rendre la pareille... en outrepassant légèrement les termes stricts de notre accord. Tenez, je vous ai apporté un petit cadeau en guise de remerciement. Et puisse l'Exalté continuer de veiller sur les chemins que vous emprunterez. »
languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez qualifier notre relation de ce que vous voulez, shereen. Les mots n'ont que peu de sens, après tout. Cependant, comme vous avez pris soin de moi, j'aimerais vous rendre la pareille... en outrepassant légèrement les termes stricts de notre accord. Tenez, je vous ai apporté un petit cadeau en guise de remerciement. Et puisse l'Exalté continuer de veiller sur les chemins que vous emprunterez. »

languages.text: "İlişkimizi istediğin şekilde tanımlamakta özgürsün şirinim. Nihayetinde sözcüklerin ifade ettikleri anlam önemsizdir. Bana kol kanat gerdin, ben de aynısını senin için yapmak ve aramızdaki anlaşmanın net şartlarının biraz da ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Sana minnetimin bir göstergesi olarak küçük bir armağan getirdim. Görkemli, geçtiğin yollarda seni kollayıp gözetsin."
languages.original_text: "You are welcome to call our relations whatever you like, shereen. After all, words mean little. But you have taken good care of me, and so I would like to take good care of you... and go slightly beyond the strict terms of our agreement. Here, I brought a small gift as a token of gratitude. And may the Exalted One keep watching over the paths that you tread."

traits.locale_text: "İlişkimizi istediğin şekilde tanımlamakta özgürsün şirinim. Nihayetinde sözcüklerin ifade ettikleri anlam önemsizdir. Bana kol kanat gerdin, ben de aynısını senin için yapmak ve aramızdaki anlaşmanın net şartlarının biraz da ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Sana minnetimin bir göstergesi olarak küçük bir armağan getirdim. Görkemli, geçtiğin yollarda seni kollayıp gözetsin."
